response.overview: Jerry Miculek Practical Rifle helps you get the most out of your rifle and build your shooting skills. Learn how to shoot your AR-15 smarter, better, and faster from one of the world’s fastest, most knowledgeable, and “winningest” shooters, Jerry Miculek. He provides over two hours of expert one-on-one instruction that covers everything about shooting the AR-15, from how to set up your rifle like his, to the stance, grip, and trigger technique used by the pros. Plus, he'll take you through plenty of basic and advanced drills that’ll improve your shooting. Learn how to reload and clear malfunctions quickly, move and acquire targets faster, engage multiple and moving targets, and shoot from behind cover and in different positions.
response.title: Jerry Miculek Practical Rifle

results.name: Brownells Presents Jerry Miculek Practical Rifle Trailer
